bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Income Tax Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Prescribed classes of individuals not resident in British Columbia on December 31, 2007
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 13.02 (1) (a) (ii) of the Act, the following classes of individuals are prescribed:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: those individuals, each of whom is an individual who

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: subject to section 250 (5) [deemed non-resident] of the federal Act, is deemed under section 250 (1) (b) to (g) of the federal Act to be resident in Canada throughout the taxation year that includes December 31, 2007, and

bcl:clause.bcl:text: in the taxation year that includes December 31, 2007, or

in a taxation year that is the first taxation year in a continuous series of taxation years for which the individual is deemed under that section of the federal Act to be resident in Canada and that includes the taxation year that includes December 31, 2007;

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: those individuals, each of whom is an individual who

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: is a cohabiting spouse or common-law partner of an individual who is in the class prescribed in paragraph (a),
was resident in Canada in the taxation year that includes December 31, 2007 or in any preceding taxation year, and
is, or whose cohabiting spouse or common-law partner is,

bcl:clause.bcl:text: a person described in paragraph (e) (i) to (iv) of the definition of "eligible individual" in section 122.6 of the federal Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Prescribed class of individuals less than 18 years of age
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 13.02 (1) (b) (iii) of the Act, the prescribed class of individuals are those individuals, each of whom is, on December 31, 2007, an individual

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: who is less than 18 years of age, and

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: is a cohabiting spouse or common-law partner of an individual, or
is a qualified dependant but is not residing with a person who would otherwise be an eligible individual in respect of that individual.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 13.04 (2) (a) of the Act, a return of income, as defined in section 122.6 of the federal Act, for the 2006 or 2007 taxation year is required to be provided to the minister.
For the purposes of section 13.04 (2) (b) (ii) of the Act, the following information and records are required to be provided to the Commissioner of Income Tax:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: information and records that provide proof, satisfactory to the Commissioner of Income Tax, of the individual's age;
if the individual is filing an application as an eligible individual in respect of a qualified dependant,

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: the qualified dependant's social insurance number,
information and records that provide proof, satisfactory to the Commissioner of Income Tax, that the individual is the eligible individual in respect of the qualified dependant, and
information and records that provide proof, satisfactory to the Commissioner of Income Tax, of the qualified dependant's age.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Prescribed date — no further assessments, determinations or decisions

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 13.05 (1) of the Act, the prescribed date is December 1, 2010.
